TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsStreamSecurityBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISecurityCapabilities, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ITransportTokenAssertionProvider, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension
Public Class WindowsStreamSecurityBindingElement Inherits BindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension, ISecurityCapabilities, ITransportTokenAssertionProvider

summary.span: 表示用于指定 Windows 流安全设置的绑定元素。

span.span: Represents the binding element used to specify Windows stream security settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用面向流协议（如 TCP 和命名管道）的传输支持基于流的传输升级。Transports that use a stream-oriented protocol such as TCP and named pipes support stream-based transport upgrades. 特别是 WCF 提供了安全升级。Specifically, WCF provides security upgrades. 此传输安全的配置由此类和 包装，您可以对它们进行配置并将其添加到自定义绑定。The configuration of this transport security is encapsulated by this class as well as by , which can be configured and added to a custom binding. 此外，第三方可以写入其自定义的 `StreamSecurityBindingElement`。In addition, a third party can write its own custom `StreamSecurityBindingElement`. 这些绑定元素会扩展为了生成客户端和服务器流升级提供程序而调用的 类。These binding elements extend the class that is called to build the client and server stream upgrade providers. 自定义绑定包含以特定顺序排列的绑定元素集合：首先添加表示绑定堆栈顶部的元素，其次是绑定堆栈中的下一个元素，依此类推。A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element representing the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack is added second, and so on. ### 将此类添加到绑定中To add this class to a binding 1. 创建 。Create a . 2. 在绑定堆栈中创建将位于此绑定元素之上的自定义绑定元素，比如可选的 和 。Create any required custom binding elements that are above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional and . 3. 使用 方法，按照前面介绍的顺序将已创建的元素添加到 。Add the created elements in the order described previously to the using the method. 4. 创建 的实例，并将其添加到集合。Create an instance of and add it to the collection. 5. 将任何其他自定义绑定元素添加到集合，比如 。Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法接收绑定上下文作为输入参数，该参数表示绑定元素的堆栈。This method receives a binding context as an input parameter, which represents the stack of binding elements. 此方法直接获取指定的对象，将查询向下委托给堆栈中的下一个绑定元素或这两个元素的组合。This method gets the specified object directly, delegates the inquiry to the next-lower binding element in the stack, or a combination of the two. 如果此方法委托查询，则它可以修改上下文。It can modify the context if it delegates the inquiry. 堆栈中的每个绑定元素在受到委托后都可以重复此过程，直到到达堆栈底部。Each binding element in the stack can repeat this process, if it has been delegated to, until the bottom of the stack is reached. 返回的对象通常是属性的集合。The object returned is usually a collection of properties. 如果 `T` 的类型为 ，则返回此类的一个实例，且 、If the type of `T` is , then an instance of this class is returned with , 和 都设置为 `true`，而 和 都设置为此绑定中的当前值。, and all set to `true`, and and set to the current value in this binding. 如果 `T` 的类型为 ，则返回此类的一个默认实例。If the type of `T` is , then a default instance of this class is returned. 此方法由绑定元素以及运行时对象（例如 、 和 ）实现。This method is implemented by binding elements as well as by the run-time objects such as , , and .

summary.span: 导出有关 Windows 流安全的自定义策略断言。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion about Windows stream security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与绑定相关的语句写入特定协定公开的 WSDL 信息，WCF 用于向客户端通信的绑定堆栈中此自定义绑定元素存在。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by WCF to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 此方法接受两个参数： 和 对象。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 使用 , 和 方法以获取从不同范围导出的策略断言的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 然后，使用此方法将您自己的策略断言添加到适当的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 属性可公开正在导出的终结点的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 这样，此方法就可正确限定它们的导出策略断言的范围。This enables this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，代码中的安全属性可以将行为添加到指示安全策略断言应该添加到的位置的 。For example, security attributes in code can add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 一旦将自定义策略断言附加到 WSDL 信息，客户端就可以通过实现 接口来检测和导入自定义绑定断言。Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.
